Abduct.name: 劫持
Abduct.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动一名正被其擒抱的生物时无需额外消耗移动力。

Aberrant Ground.name: 异变丛生
Aberrant Ground.description: 源自 [[lookup @name]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]] 尺光环区域内的地面视为 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]。

Absorb Body.name: 吞吃躯体
Absorb Body.description:
力量豁免检定: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]], 单一[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]]且[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的生物。

失败:目标被拉入[[lookup @name lowercase]]所在的空间并被嫁接到尸聚怪身上。[[lookup @name lowercase]]同时能嫁接的生物数上限为一。

被嫁接期间,目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态且其进行的体质豁免具有劣势。当[[lookup @name lowercase]]移动时, 被嫁接目标也将一并移动。如果[[lookup @activation.condition activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]],其遗体将被摧毁，且 [[lookup @name lowercase]]恢复 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]]生命值。

被嫁接目标自身或位于[[lookup @name lowercase]] 5尺内的生物，都能够以动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]。检定成功则目标不再被嫁接，并移动至[[lookup @name lowercase]]5尺内的一处未占据空间。

heal.condition: 若目标在被嫁接期间死亡

Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.name: 陷入束缚状态且进行体质豁。
Grafted: Con Saves and Restrained.description:
被嫁接期间，目标陷入束缚 状态且其进行的体质豁免具有劣势。

被嫁接目标自身或位于尸聚怪5尺内的生物，都能够以动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]] (DC值参考源物品)。 检定成功则目标不再被嫁接，并移动至尸聚怪5尺内的一处未占据空间。

Acid Absorption.name: 强酸吸收
Acid Absorption.description: 每当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到 &Reference[Acid] 伤害，其不受伤害，改为恢复等于强酸伤害数值的生命值。

Acid Absorption.name: 强酸吸收
Acid Absorption.description: 该生物免疫强酸伤害，改为恢复等于强酸伤害数值的生命值

Acid Breath.name: 强酸吐息
Acid Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] 尺宽的线状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。

成功：半伤。

Acid Spray.name: 酸液喷射
Acid Spray.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺长， [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺宽的线状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Adhesive (Object Form Only).name: 粘附（仅物件形态）
Adhesive (Object Form Only).description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 粘附在任何触碰到其的东西上。体型不超过巨型的被粘附生物陷入&Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]，请查看源条目以获取DC）。为逃脱此擒抱进行的属性检定具有劣势。

Advanced Telepathy.name: 增强心灵感应
Advanced Telepathy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以感知到其60尺内的任何心灵感应交流的内容。

Aim.name: 瞄准
Aim.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 令其在当前回合中进行的下次攻击检定具有优势。

Air Form.name: 空气形态
Air Form.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]可以进入并停留在一名生物所处的空间。其可以移动穿过最窄1寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Animal Lordship.name: 万兽之主
Animal Lordship.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 代表着觅兽、猎兽、睿兽中的一种（由DM选择），这会决定数据卡中的特定特质。

造型表 Appearance Tables

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmForagerAnimalL rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{觅兽之兽主造型}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmHunterAnimalLo rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{猎兽之兽主造型}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmSageAnimalLord rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{睿兽之兽主造型}

Animal Spirit.name: 兽灵之力
Animal Spirit.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 咒唤一道兽之灵体，其将袭向一个生物并随即消失。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的生物。失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。成功： 半伤。失败或成功： 出现以下一道效应：

卫戍之力（仅觅兽）。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 获得 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=emHqEek8e9Mwyaj7]] 临时生命值。

标定猎物 Marked as Prey（仅猎兽）。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 对目标发动的攻击检定具有优势，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

恼人兽群（仅睿兽）。目标在攻击检定和属性检定上具有劣势，直至其下一回合结束。

Hunter: Marked as Prey.name: 猎兽：标定猎物
Hunter: Marked as Prey.description: 兽主对你发动的攻击检定具有优势，直至兽主的下一回合开始。

Sage: Pesky Swarm.name: 睿兽：恼人兽群
Sage: Pesky Swarm.description: 你在攻击检定和属性检定上具有劣势，直至下一回合结束。

Animate Boulders.name: 活化石头
Animate Boulders.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 用魔法活化 [[lookup @range.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] 尺内其可见的至多两块大石头。每块被活化的石头均使用 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGalebDuhr00000] 的数据卡，但有以下区别：石头的智力和魅力值为 1且无法说话，并缺少活化石头动作。石头服从 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的命令，使用与 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 一样的先攻并在其回合结束后立即执行回合。石头的活化持续 [[lookup @duration.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] 分钟，或在以下情况提前结束：其死亡时、该 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡时。

Antennae.name: 触角
Antennae.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object. Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.name: 伤害：护甲等级或攻击检定获得-1减值
Damaged: -1 AC/Attack.description: 物件提供的AC（护甲）或进行的攻击检定（武器）获得-1减值。护甲AC降至10、武器减值达到-5时，物件被摧毁。 。对护甲和武器施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] 可以移除该减值。

Antimagic Cone.name: 反魔法锥域
Antimagic Cone.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]的主眼向 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] 尺锥状区域内发出一道反魔法能量波。此区域内如同 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF]，且此区域同样反制 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 自己的眼波射线，直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

Aquatic Burst.name: 洋流冲刷
Aquatic Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[倒地] 状态。

Aquatic Charge.name: 水下冲锋
Aquatic Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线游动至多等于其游泳速度的距离。

Arcane Prowl.name: 奥术潜步
Arcane Prowl.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]传送至多 [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] 尺至其可见的未占据空间，然后发动一次 [[/item Claw]] 攻击。

Arcane Tentacles.name: Arcane Tentacles
Arcane Tentacles.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]，且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以将目标传送至多 30 尺至一处[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的、有足以支撑目标的表面或液体的未占据空间中。 若目标因此伤害生命值降至 0， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 杀死目标并以魔法吞食其大脑。

Astral Implosion.name: 星界内爆
Astral Implosion.description: 若[[lookup @name lowcase]] 降至 0 生命值，则其内爆并将其吞入体内的一切生物和物件喷进星界海。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 随即消失，只在原地留下一滩覆盖周围 600 尺的粘液。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 会在 [[/r 1d20#年]] 年内于物质位面中的某个随机世界重组。

Attach.name: 吸附
Attach.description:
[[/attack extended]]，[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 会吸附在其身上。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 吸附期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态，且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法对其他生物发动啃咬攻击。此外， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 所受的伤害减半（向下取整），且目标承受等额的伤害。

[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以消耗 5 尺移动力解除吸附。目标或其 [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] 尺内的生物可以用动作来尝试解除 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的依附，这么做需要成功通过一次DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]]的力量（运动）检定。

Detach Attempt.name: 尝试解除
Detach Attempt.condition: 目标或处于其范围内的生物所采取的动作

Attached: Blinded.name: 吸附：目盲
Attached: Blinded.description: 被吸附期间，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

Aura of Authority.name: 威权灵光
Aura of Authority.description: 只要 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态，则其与其身处源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]] 尺光环区域内的盟友进行攻击检定与豁免时具有优势。

Aura of Bravery.name: 勇毅灵光
Aura of Bravery.description: 位于[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]尺光环区域内的、由天命骑士选择的生物，若身处该区域内，则其对 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 与 &Reference[Frightened apply=false]状态免疫。

Charmed & Frightened.name: 魅惑与恐慌
Charmed & Frightened.description: 你对 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 与 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态免疫。

Avalanche Slam.name: 岩崩猛击
Avalanche Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在此次攻击前立即向着目标直线移动了至少30尺，且目标生物体型不超过大型，则其额外受到 [[/damage average]]伤害并陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Aversion to Fire.name: 厌火
Aversion to Fire.description: 若 [[lookup @name]] 受到火焰伤害，则进行的攻击检定和属性检定将具有劣势，直至其下一回合结束。

Averse.name: 畏惧
Averse.description: 你进行的攻击检定和属性检定将具有劣势，直至下一回合结束。

Avoidance.name: 神避
Avoidance.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到一个允许其进行豁免来只承受一半伤害的效应影响时，其豁免成功时不受伤害，豁免失败时只承受一半伤害。其无法在失能期间使用此特质。

Awestruck.name: 敬惧
Awestruck.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下个回合开始。

Baleful Command.name: 恶毒命令
Baleful Command.description:
感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]，源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] 尺光环区域内的所有敌人。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 与 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态直至罗刹的下一回合开始。

Frightened & Incapacitated.name: 恐慌与失能
Frightened & Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 与 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，直至罗刹的下个回合开始。

Banish.name: 放逐
Banish.description:
魅力豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，并被转移至一处无害的半位面直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下一回合开始，此时其将重新出现在 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 于 [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] 尺内选择的一处未被占据的空间。

失败或成功：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Banished: Incapacitated.name: 放逐：失能
Banished: Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，并被转移至一处无害的半位面直至金龙的下一回合开始，此时你将重新出现在金龙于 120 尺内选择的一处未被占据的空间。

Banishing Claw.name: 放逐利爪（需要灵魂秘典）
Banishing Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标为生物，则目标承受以下效应。

魅力豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTrsaQFwVagWU19h]]。

失败： 目标被困在灵魂秘典内的半位面中。受困期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态，目标在其回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=cha]] 豁免，成功则逃出秘典。当目标逃出时，目标出现在其消失的空间。若该空间被占据，则其将出现在最近的未占据空间。

若目标在半位面中豁免失败三次，则目标会与秘典绑定，只能在秘典生命值降为 0 时才可逃出。

Trapped: Incapacitated.name: 受困：失能
Trapped: Incapacitated.description: 你被困在灵魂秘典内的半位面中。受困期间，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。你在每回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=cha]] 豁免，成功则逃出秘典。当你逃出时，你出现在你消失的空间。

Barbed Hide.name: 猬皮
Barbed Hide.description: 在每个自己的回合开始时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 对[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]]造成 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Beaks.name: 喙啄
Beaks.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]， 若处于[[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]则改为 [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

Beard.name: 须刺
Beard.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至[[lookup @name lowcase]]的下一回合开始。以此法中毒的生物在中毒期间无法恢复生命值。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至须魔的下一回合开始。中毒期间无法恢复生命值。

Beast of Burden.name: 驼兽
Beast of Burden.description: 在决定[[lookup @name lowercase]]的载重能力时，其被视为更大一级的体型。

Beguile.name: 诱骗
Beguile.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]，无需法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]）。 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Beguiling Song.name: 迷魅之歌
Beguiling Song.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]] 尺内一点为中心半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rbe2FvPTepUsO4GL]] 尺的球状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下一回合结束。

成功：仅半伤。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至演艺传奇的下一回合开始。

Beguiling Strike.name: 迷魅惑心
Beguiling Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下一回合开始。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态直至贵血天骄下个回合开始。

Berserk.name: 失心狂怒
Berserk.description:
若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在回合开始时&Reference[Bloodied]，掷 [[/r 1d6]]。骰值为 6 时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 开始失心狂怒。[[lookup @name lowercase]] ，其在其回合内攻击距其最近的其可见的生物。若没有生物位于其能够移动并攻击到的范围内，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 攻击物件。一旦 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 开始失心狂怒，狂怒持续至其被摧毁或其不再浴血。

若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的创造者位于[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] 尺内，则创造者能够以动作进行一次 [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]]检定以试图让 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 冷静下来。此时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 必须能听见其创造者。检定成功则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 不再狂怒直至其下个回合开始，若此时 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 仍浴血，则为狂怒特质重新投掷d6。

Berserk.name: 失心狂怒
Berserk.description: 你开始失心狂怒。你狂怒期间，其在其回合内攻击距其最近的其可见的生物。若没有生物位于其能够移动并攻击到的范围内，则你攻击物件。一旦你开始失心狂怒，狂怒持续至其被摧毁或其不再&Reference[Bloodied apply=false]。

Bites.name: 啃咬
Bites.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]， 若处于[[lookup @activation.condition activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]] 则改为[[/damage average activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]]

Blazing Movement.name: 炽烈移动
Blazing Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]移动至多等于其速度的距离且不会引发 &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。在火蜥蜴移动过程中，火焰会充斥于源自[[lookup @name lowercase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MUbX28KmoDF9sC5b]]尺光环区域内。当光环进入一个生物所处空间时，该生物受到 [[/damage average]]伤害。 每名生物每回合仅受一次此伤害。

Blight Seeds.name: 枯萎之种
Blight Seeds.description:
当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 完成一次长休时，其会把 [[/r 1d6#Seeds expelled]]颗种子播撒到 30 尺内的地面上的未占据空间。24 小时后，这些种子会成长为受 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 控制的生物。为每颗种子投掷 1d8，以决定其变为什么生物：

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmBlightSeedCrea rollable classes="caption-top"]

Blinding Breath.name: 致盲吐息
Blinding Breath.description: 敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。 失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合结束。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至施加者的下一回合结束。

Blinding Flash.name: 目盲闪光
Blinding Flash.description: 体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见一点为中心半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Onad9uNiCzAMfuwf]] 尺的球状区域内的每名生物。Failure: [[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。成功：仅半伤。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至斗篷怪的下一回合开始。

Blinding Gaze.name: 致盲凝视
Blinding Gaze.description: 体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]]， 单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的生物。 失败： 目标陷入目盲 &Reference[Blinded apply=false]状态，持续1分钟。失败或成功： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Blinding Spittle.name: 致盲唾液
Blinding Spittle.description: 敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] 尺内一点为中心的半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] 尺球状区域内的所有生物。失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合结束。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态，直至炽天神使的下一回合结束。

Blood Frenzy.name: 血腥狂怒
Blood Frenzy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对生命值未满的生物进行攻击检定时具有优势。

Bloodied Frenzy.name: 浴血狂热
Bloodied Frenzy.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在 &Reference[Bloodied] 期间进行的攻击检定与豁免检定具有优势。

Bloodied Fury.name: 浴血狂怒
Bloodied Fury.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在&Reference[Bloodied]期间进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Blurred Form.name: 朦胧形态
Blurred Form.description: 除非 [[lookup @name lowercase]]状态， 否则对其进行的攻击检定具有劣势。

Bolster.name: 鼓舞
Bolster.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]获得 [[lookup @healing.formula activity=v5km8Vio4N6HgkF6]] 临时生命值，且[[lookup @name lowercase]]及其 [[lookup @range.value activity=v5km8Vio4N6HgkF6]] 尺内的盟友进行的D20检定具有优势，直到[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合结束。此后[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Bolstered: Test Advantage.name: 鼓舞：检定优势
Bolstered: Test Advantage.description: 你进行的D20检定具有优势，直到至高天的下一回合结束。

Bone Whip.name: 骸骨长鞭
Bone Whip.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始，目标无法发动&Reference[OpportunityAttacks]。

No Opportunity Attacks.name: 借机攻击
No Opportunity Attacks.description: 你无法发动 &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] 直至寇涛的下一回合开始。

Boulder.name: 投石
Boulder.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[倒地] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Boulder Toss.name: 巨石抛掷
Boulder Toss.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 将一块巨石抛向 [[lookup @range.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]] 尺内可见一点。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]]，以目标点为中心，半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]] 尺球状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]，若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

成功： 仅半伤。

Bound.name: 连接
Bound.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 与一个命令护符魔法性地相连。在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 和其命令护符位于同一存在位面期间，命令护符的佩戴者可以心灵感应般的呼唤 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 来到自己的位置，并且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 知晓自己与命令护符的距离及其位置。如果 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 位于命令护符佩戴者60尺范围内，佩戴者所承受到的任何伤害的一半（向上取整）都会转移给 [[lookup @name lowercase]]。

Brutal Gore.name: 凶蛮犄角
Brutal Gore.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过巨型，其被直线推离至多 20 尺并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Bubble Dash.name: 泡泡疾行
Bubble Dash.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处水下， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 至多等于其游泳速度的距离且不会引发&Reference[Opportunity Attacks]{借机攻击}。

Burn.name: 燃烧
Burn.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。 若目标为生物或和易燃物件，则其开始&Reference[burning]。

Burst of Wonder.name: 奇妙尘爆
Burst of Wonder.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]，或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTashasHide]，需材料成分并使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Burst of Ingenuity.name: 灵光乍现
Burst of Ingenuity.description: 触发： [[lookup @name]]或其 [[lookup @range.value activity=AyYipNx3cFaXA0LU]] 尺内另一生物进行一次属性检定或豁免检定。响应： 斯芬克斯令其结果+2。

Cacophony.name: 不谐和音
Cacophony.description: 感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pyvvXqoxJsjkkP38]]，单一位于 [[lookup @name lowercase]]空间内的生物。 失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]下个回合开始。耳聋期间，目标进行的属性检定和攻击检定还会具有劣势。

Deafened and Disadvantaged.name: 耳聋并处于劣势
Deafened and Disadvantaged.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Deafened apply=false]状态直至渡鸦集群下个回合开始。

Captain’s Charm.name: 领袖魅力
Captain’s Charm.description:
感知豁免： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]]，单一[[lookup @range.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见的生物。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下个回合开始。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态直至海盗船长下个回合开始。

Captivated.name: 迷醉
Captivated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。魅惑期间，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。魅惑期间，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Cataclysmic Event.name: 大灾变
Cataclysmic Event.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 从下列效应中随机制造一种（掷 [[/r 1d4#大灾变]]）：

1：焚天业火。敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]]可见一点为源点半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] 尺球状区域内的所有生物。失败： [[/damage average activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]]伤害。成功： 半伤。失败或成功： 目标开始&Reference[burning]。

2：封冻寒潮。力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。失败： [[/damage average activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]伤害外加[[/damage average activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。成功： 仅半伤。失败或成功： 目标的速度降至 0，直至其下一回合结束。

3：呼啸飓风。 一道暴风云覆盖以[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]尺内其可见一点为中心，半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] 尺的球状区域。暴风云持续存在 1 分钟，或是直到[[lookup @name lowercase]]再次使用大灾变时提前结束。完全位于风暴云内的生物陷入&Reference[Blinded apply=false]和&Reference[Deafened apply=false]状态且不能施展具有言语成分的法术。敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]，在某个回合中首次进入暴风云或是在其中开始回合的所有生物。失败： [[/damage average activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]伤害外加[[/damage average activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]伤害。成功： 半伤。

4：大地巨口。力量豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]，以 [[lookup @range.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] 尺内地面上一点为源点，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] 尺立方区域内的每个生物。失败： [[/damage average activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]伤害外加[[/damage average activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]伤害，且目标陷入&Reference[Prone apply=false]状态并被埋入碎石之中。被埋入碎石的生物陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，具有&Reference[Total Cover]，且&Reference[suffocating]。被埋入碎石的生物或是其 5 尺内的另一生物以一个动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]]。检定成功则该生物不再被埋入碎石。成功： 仅半伤。

Buried: Escape Check.name: 埋藏：逃脱检定
Buried: Escape Check.condition: 被埋藏生物或范围内的生物以一个动作

Freezing Waves: Zero Speed.name: 封冻寒潮：速度归零
Freezing Waves: Zero Speed.description: 你的速度降至 0，直至你的下一回合结束。

Raging Storm: Blind, Deaf, Verbal Compon.name: 呼啸飓风：目盲，耳聋，禁言
Raging Storm: Blind, Deaf, Verbal Compon.description: 若你完全位于风暴云内，则陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 和 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态且不能施展具有言语成分的法术。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description:
2：封冻寒潮。你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态

4：大地巨口。 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态并被埋入碎石之中。

Swallowing Earth: Restrained, Cover, Suf.name: 大地巨口：束缚，掩护，窒息
Swallowing Earth: Restrained, Cover, Suf.description: 你被埋入碎石，陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，具有 &Reference[Total Cover]，且 &Reference[suffocating]。你或是不 5 尺内的另一生物以一个动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long] （逃脱DC 18）检定。检定成功则不再被埋入碎石。

Celestial Restoration.name: 天界复苏
Celestial Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡，则除非其遗骸被施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelEvil]，其在 [[/r 1d6#天]] 天后重获生命并恢复全部生命值。

Chain.name: 锁链
Chain.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其被两条锁链之一所擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 如果目标的体型不超过大型则被两条锁链之一所擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]) ，陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

Chaos Blade.name: 混沌刃锋
Chaos Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。目标陷入某种状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始，投掷 1d4 决定： 1 为&Reference[Charmed apply=false]；2 为&Reference[Frightened apply=false]；3 为&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]；4 为&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]。

Chaos Claw.name: 混沌爪击
Chaos Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。目标陷入某种状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始，投掷 1d4 决定： 1 为&Reference[Charmed apply=false]；2 为&Reference[Frightened apply=false]；3 为&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]；4 为&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]。

Chaos Staff.name: 混沌法杖
Chaos Staff.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。目标陷入某种状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始，投掷 1d4 决定： 1 为&Reference[Charmed apply=false]；2 为&Reference[Frightened apply=false]；3 为&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]；4 为&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]。

Charge.name: 冲锋
Charge.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 向一名其可见的敌人直线移动至多等于其速度一半的距离。

Charged Tendril.name: 带电卷须
Charged Tendril.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 将目标直线拉近5尺。

Charging Horn.name: 冲锋角击
Charging Horn.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

Charm.name: 魅惑
Charm.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Bite]], the damage of which doesn’t end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Charming.name: 魅惑之音
Charming.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=xc46oIdnDPdbeXVN]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=xc46oIdnDPdbeXVN]]. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place. The effect ends on the target if it takes any damage.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: 魅惑并失能
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态 1 分钟。

魅惑期间，目标陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且会用尽自身的移动力来在原地跳舞。

Chill.name: 彻骨冻寒
Chill.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Chilling Gaze.name: 寒颤凝视
Chilling Gaze.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EREXmcv7YU7T9pj6]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EREXmcv7YU7T9pj6]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage. Success: The target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态（除非目标对寒冷伤害免疫），直至巨恶雪怪的下一回合开始。

Chomp.name: 切齿
Chomp.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击。

Chromatic Spittle.name: 繁彩飞沫
Chromatic Spittle.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]] （伤害类型由[[lookup @name lowercase]]从下列选项中选择一种：强酸，寒冷，火焰，闪电，毒素。）

Cinder Breath.name: 燃烬吐息
Cinder Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tb7VfYTYKzOxuE5S]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至施加者的下一回合结束。

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
逃脱DC

[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其被四爪之二擒抱，陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 (逃脱 DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）， 且目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态直至擒抱结束。

Grappled and Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled and Restrained.description:
若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 （逃脱 DC 14，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]），且你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

逃脱检定 (见源物品DC)

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Cloaked Flight.name: 翔空无影
Cloaked Flight.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili] ，并飞行至多等于其飞行速度一半的距离。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Clockwork Blade.name: 时械剑刃
Clockwork Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。 命中或失手： T剑刃会在被用于一次远程攻击后立即魔法性地回到[[lookup @name lowercase]]手中。

Clockwork Spear.name: 时械之矛
Clockwork Spear.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

命中或失手：矛会在被用于一次远程攻击后立即魔法性地回到[[lookup @name lowercase]]手中。

Cloud of Insects.name: 虫群云聚
Cloud of Insects.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，且目标为维持 &Reference[Concentration] 而进行的体质豁免具有劣势，持续直至其下一回合结束。

失败或成功：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Clouded.name: 云聚
Clouded.description: 你为维持专注而进行的体质豁免具有劣势，持续直至下一回合结束。

Cold Breath.name: 寒冷吐息
Cold Breath.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Cold Gale.name: 寒风掠
Cold Gale.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]] 尺宽的线状区域内的每个生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]。

成功：仅半伤。

失败或成功：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

save.chatFlavor: 失败：目标被银龙直线推开至多 30 尺。

Commanding Presence.name: 霸者威仪
Commanding Presence.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]（2 环版本）。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Compression.name: 柔韧躯体
Compression.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Confer Fire Resistance.name: 赋予火焰抗性
Confer Fire Resistance.description: 骑乘[[lookup @name lowercase]]期间，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以赋予一名骑手对火焰伤害的抗性。

Resistance: Fire.name: 抗性：火焰
Resistance: Fire.description: 骑乘梦魇期间，梦魇可以赋予一名骑手对火焰伤害的抗性。

Confusing Gaze.name: 困惑凝视
Confusing Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tvHG0MEXOUVoCLuO]]-foot Cone. Failure: The target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Conjure Infernal Chain.name: 咒唤地狱锁链
Conjure Infernal Chain.description:
[[lookup @name lowcase]] 咒唤出一条炽热的锁链来束缚住某个生物。

敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]]，[[lookup @range.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的一个生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害。目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 下一回合开始，此时锁链消失。若目标生物体型不超过大型，[[lookup @name lowcase]] 将其向自身方向直线移动至多 30 尺。

成功： 锁链直接消失。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 你陷入&Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态直至链魔的下一回合结束。

Conjured Dragon’s Breath.name: 咒唤龙息
Conjured Dragon’s Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=kONz26XFQN0nYcDS]] Cone. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Constrict.name: 绞缠
Constrict.description:
力量豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的体型[[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]]的生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]），且目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态直至擒抱结束。

Grappled and Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled and Restrained.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 17），且直到擒抱结束前陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。

[[/check skill=ath ability=str]]

[[/check skill=acr ability=dex]]

Constricting Vine.name: 藤蔓绞缠
Constricting Vine.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage average activity=7voODpkc7vuuouqM]] damage at the start of each of its turns, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Constricting Vine attacks.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若目标为大型或更小型生物, 其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 (逃脱DC [[/check skill=ath/acr format=long]], see source item for DC).

Consume Life.name: 摄食生命
Consume Life.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] feet. that has 0 Hit Points. Failure: The target dies, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/healing average activity=1waYTjY3NAIGZgrI]].

Failure: Dead.name: 失败：死亡
Failure: Dead.description: The target dies if the creature that is at 0 Hit Points fails a Constitution save.

Consume Memories.name: 吞噬记忆
Consume Memories.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] feet. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] damage. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains the target’s memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

Contortionist.name: 擅曲之物
Contortionist.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以移动穿过最窄 1 寸宽的空间而无需消耗额外的移动力。

Control Weather.name: 操控天气
Control Weather.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplControlWea] ，无需任何法术成分并使用体质作为施法属性。

Corrosive Form.name: 腐蚀形态
Corrosive Form.description:
生物以近战攻击检定命中 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 时，其受到 [[/damage average]]伤害。非魔法弹药在命中 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 并造成任意伤害后将立刻被摧毁。任何非魔法武器在对 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 造成伤害并与其接触后将积累 -1 的攻击检定减值。当此减值累计达到 -5 时该武器将被摧毁。对武器施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]可以移除这一减值。

在 1 分钟时间里，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以吃穿 2 尺厚度的非魔法金属或木材。

Foundry Note

该特性提供了一个攻击减值主动效应，会改变选定的武器。由于这种减值可多次施加于多个非魔法武器上，所以此主动效应需要从该物品的“效应”选项卡拖放到目标物品的武器上。

Damaged: -1 Attack.name: 伤害：攻击检定 -1
Damaged: -1 Attack.description: 任意非魔法武器在接触到黑布丁并造成伤害到后将积累 -1 的攻击检定减值。

Counterattack.name: 招架反击
Counterattack.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can make one Greatsword or Longbow attack against the attacker.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 武者被一次攻击检定命中

Response: +4 AC.name: 反应：+4 AC
Response: +4 AC.description: 武将令其对抗那次攻击的AC+4，可能令那次攻击改为失手。

Counterspell.name: 法术反制
Counterspell.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]（触发条件见该法术），使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Coven Magic.name: 集会魔法
Coven Magic.description: 在 30 尺内有至少两个鬼婆盟友的情况下，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以施展以下法术之一，无需任何材料成分，使用法术的原本施法时间，并使用智力作为法术的施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]）：@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAugury0000]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFindFamili]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplIdentify00]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLocateObje]、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 必须完成一次长休后才能再次用此特质施展其所选的法术。

Crackling Wave.name: 巫咒霹雳
Crackling Wave.description:
敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

失败或成功： 目标被诅咒，持续至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合结束。目标无法执行反应，直至此诅咒结束。

Cursed: No Reaction.name: 诅咒：无法反应
Cursed: No Reaction.description: 直至你的下一回合结束。在此诅咒结束前，你无法使用反应。

Create Specter.name: 创造幽灵
Create Specter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ypIQdXr13u7LATUP]] feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target’s spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSpecter0000000]{Specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

Create Whirlwind.name: 引动龙卷旋风
Create Whirlwind.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在 120 尺内它可见的一点，咒唤出一道龙卷风。龙卷风会覆盖半径 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] 尺、高 [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] 尺的柱状区域，并持续 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 专注终止。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在其回合开始时可以将龙卷风向任意方向移动至多 20 尺。每当龙卷风进入生物所处空间或生物进入龙卷风时，该生物承受以下效应。

力量豁免检定: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]（每个生物一回合仅需进行一次此豁免，[[lookup @name lowercase]]不受影响）。

失败: 目标在身处龙卷风内期间陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，，并随龙卷风一并移动。束缚目标在其回合开始时受到[[/damage average]]伤害。目标在其回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description:
你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，随龙卷风一并移动。

你在其回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。

Crush.name: 挤压
Crush.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且[[lookup @name lowercase]] 会吸附在目标身上。若目标生物体型不超过中型且 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 将会覆盖目标，令[[lookup @name lowercase]] 以此法吸附期间，该生物陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false]状态且&Reference[suffocating apply=false]{窒息}。

[[lookup @name lowercase]] 吸附目标期间，其仅可攻击该目标，但其攻击检定具有优势。其速度降至 0，无法受益于任何增加速度的增益，且其会随着目标一起移动。

生物可以用动作来尝试解除 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的吸附，这么做需要成功通过一次[[/check format=long]]检定。其回合内，[[lookup @name lowercase]]的回合内，[[lookup @name lowercase]]可以消耗 5 尺移动力解除吸附。

Blinded & Suffocating.name: 目盲并窒息
Blinded & Suffocating.description: 被吸附期间，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态且 &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{窒息}。

Self: Attack Adv./0 Speed.name: 自身：攻击优势并速度归零
Self: Attack Adv./0 Speed.description: 吸附于目标期间，你仅可攻击该目标，但你攻击检定具有优势。你速度降至 0，无法受益于任何增加速度的增益，且你会随着目标一起移动。

Cunning Action.name: 灵巧动作
Cunning Action.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash apply=false]、&Reference[Disengage apply=false] 或 &Reference[Hide apply=false] 动作。

Curse of the Riddle.name: 谜题诅咒
Curse of the Riddle.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed with a riddle. The cursed target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. In addition, if it takes the Magic action, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or that action is wasted.

The cursed target can take a &Reference[Study] action to make a [[/check dc=15 ability=int format=long]], solving the riddle and ending the curse on a success. The curse ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses another target.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 目标将被谜题诅咒。受诅生物的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Cursed Touch.name: 诅咒之触
Cursed Touch.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 被诅咒期间，目标无法从完成短休或长休中获益。

Darkness Aura.name: 暗幕灵光
Darkness Aura.description: 魔法黑暗充斥在源自[[lookup @name]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=amat5Ii4NydseA0h]] 尺光环区域内。此效应在 [[lookup @name]]维持专注期间持续，持续至多 [[lookup @duration.value activity=amat5Ii4NydseA0h]] 分钟。黑暗视觉无法看透该区域，且光照无法照亮之。

Deadly Aim.name: 致命瞄准
Deadly Aim.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 令其在当前回合中发动的下一次攻击检定具有优势。且若那一次攻击命中，其目标将额外受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Deadly Leap.name: 鲨戮强跃
Deadly Leap.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 消耗 5 尺移动力跳跃至 15 尺内的一处空间，空间内需包含至少一名体型不超过大型的生物。

敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]]，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 目标空间内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，目标陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

成功：半伤，目标被推离[[lookup @name lowcase]] 5 尺。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Death Glare.name: 死亡怒视
Death Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Death Throes.name: 焚身爆
Death Throes.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在死亡时爆炸。

敏捷豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]], 源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]] 尺光环内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

失败或成功： 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 于无底深渊之外死去，其立即在无底深渊某处获得一具新的身体，以满生命值复活。

Deathless Agility.name: 不死者机敏
Deathless Agility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash] 或 &Reference[Disengage] 动作。

Deathless Strike.name: 不死者打击
Deathless Strike.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动等于其速度一半的距离，并发动一次葬送打击攻击。

Deathly Teleport.name: 蚀命传送
Deathly Teleport.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 传送至多 [[lookup @range.value activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] 尺至一处其可见的未占据空间，位于其离开的空间 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zvj61Na7MlcIN2xw]] 尺内的所有生物受到 [[/damage average]]伤害。

Deathly Wail.name: 死亡哀嚎
Deathly Wail.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases a mournful wail if it isn’t in sunlight. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mnlRA4ivGOORPiBs]], each creature within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mnlRA4ivGOORPiBs]] feet that can hear the wail and isn’t a Construct or an Undead. Failure: If the target has 25 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Decay.name: 衰竭
Decay.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=Seq1WbVdQNorBsTL]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Defensive Stance.name: Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against melee attack rolls (including the triggering attack) until the start of its next turn, possibly causing the attacks to miss.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: The pirate is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon

Defense: +4 AC.name: Defense: +4 AC
Defense: +4 AC.description: Add +4 to its AC against melee attack rolls (including the triggering attack) until the start of its next turn.

Deflect Missile.name: Deflect Missile
Deflect Missile.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=9T8cNbSBVACrrmRI]].

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces the damage it takes from the attack by [[/healing average]], and if that damage is reduced to 0, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can redirect some of the attack’s force.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Reduce Damage.name: Reduce Damage
Reduce Damage.condition: hit by a ranged attack roll and takes Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage from it

Demonic Restoration.name: Demonic Restoration
Demonic Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

Destroy Metal.name: Destroy Metal
Destroy Metal.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]. The touch destroys a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] of the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]].

Detect Intelligence.name: Detect Intelligence
Detect Intelligence.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically senses the location of any creature within 300 feet of itself that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers.

Detect Life.name: Detect Life
Detect Life.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically senses the direction of creatures up to 1 mile away that aren’t Constructs or Undead.

Devour Intellect.name: Devour Intellect
Devour Intellect.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Diabolical Restoration.name: Diabolical Restoration
Diabolical Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Disintegration.name: Disintegration
Disintegration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

Displacement.name: Displacement
Displacement.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have Disadvantage, since it projects an illusion that makes it appear to be near its actual location. This trait is suppressed while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Disrupt Life.name: Disrupt Life
Disrupt Life.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]] that isn’t an Undead in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qSz7l1czwIc5j9gP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Dissolving Pseudopod.name: Dissolving Pseudopod
Dissolving Pseudopod.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

Damaged: -1 AC.name: Damaged: -1 AC
Damaged: -1 AC.description: Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

Divine Aid.name: Divine Aid
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Divine Awareness.name: Divine Awareness
Divine Awareness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

Divine Beam.name: 神能光束炮
Divine Beam.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] 尺长、[[lookup @target.template.width activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] 宽的线状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

失败或成功：生物因光束炮生命值则被解离为尘埃，留下其着装或携带的任意魔法物品。

Divine Ray.name: 神力射线
Divine Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]从下列选项中选择一种：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、雷鸣。

Dominate Mind.name: 支配意志
Dominate Mind.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zdXAMnjaOcsVmLZP]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=zdXAMnjaOcsVmLZP]] 尺内[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直到 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 死亡或移动至目标所在位面之外的另一存在位面。魅惑期间，目标将如 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的盟友一般行动，且在它周围 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zdXAMnjaOcsVmLZP]] 尺范围内受其操控。此外，[[lookup @name lowercase]]和目标可以在任意距离内通过心灵感应沟通。

每当目标受到伤害时，或每当其在距离 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 至少 1 英里外的位置经过了 24 小时后时重新进行豁免，豁免成功则结束自身所受的影响。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态直到底栖魔鱼死亡或移动至你所在位面之外的另一存在位面。在受魅惑期间，你将如底栖魔鱼的盟友一般行动，且在它周围 60 尺范围内受其操控。此外，底栖魔鱼和你可以在任意距离内通过心灵感应沟通。

Draconic Origin.name: 龙族起源
Draconic Origin.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]] 和某种龙类的联系令其与下列伤害类型中的一种相关联（由DM选择）：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、毒素。这一选择会影响数据卡的其他部分。

Foundry Note

该特性在角色卡的“效应”选项卡中提供了一个激活效应，用于管理伤害抗性。所列出的抗性需要手动启用/禁用。

Draconic Strike.name: 拟龙炎袭
Draconic Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至施加者的下一回合开始。

Dragon’s Breath.name: 龙之吐息
Dragon’s Breath.description:
敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]] 尺锥状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害，类型为龙族起源特质所选的伤害类型。

成功：半伤。

Draining Kiss.name: 汲命之吻
Draining Kiss.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.chatFlavor: 失败或成功：目标的生命值上限减少等于其受到伤害的数值。

Draining Swipe.name: 汲命击
Draining Swipe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect in the Effects Tab to modify the target PC's Strength Score. Since this Strength reduction can be applied multiple times, the GM must drag the Active Effect in this item's Effect tab onto the PC's character sheet. From there, the GM must navigate to the Effects tab on the PC's sheet to modify the Effect Value preceded by the negative symbol, e.g., -3. Presently, it is set at -1.

attack.chatFlavor: 命中：目标的力量值降低

Dread Authority.name: 恐怖权威
Dread Authority.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Dread Command.name: 震怖命令
Dread Command.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000]（2 环版本），使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下一回合开始都无法再执行此动作。

Dread Scythe.name: 惊怖巨镰
Dread Scythe.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标将无法回复生命值，直至其下一回合结束。

Healing Restriction.name: 治疗限制
Healing Restriction.description: 你无法恢复生命值，直至你的下一回合结束。

Dreadful Glare.name: 恐怖怒视
Dreadful Glare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到木乃伊的下一回合结束。

Dreadful Howl.name: 恐怖嚎叫
Dreadful Howl.description:
感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]] 尺内所有非座狼生物。

失败： [[/damage average]]心灵伤害，并且目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的下一回合开始。

成功： 仅半伤。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至施加者的下一回合开始。

Drone.name: 嗡鸣
Drone.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]] 尺光环区域内的每名生物（此豁免恶魔自动成功）。

失败： 目标陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态，并在其回合结束时重复豁免。10 分钟后，目标受到伤害时或其 5 尺内的生物以动作向目标泼洒一瓶圣水时，其豁免自动成功。

成功： 目标在 24 小时内免疫该[[lookup @name lowercase]] 的嗡鸣。

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

Drop.name: Drop
Drop.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] falls. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yaKOcl4gDETLWHTE]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=yaKOcl4gDETLWHTE]] directly underneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces any damage it takes from the fall by 20.

Earth Burst.name: Earth Burst
Earth Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: Earth explodes from the target’s space, creating the following effect. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TS5RHvq56ByTxHGi]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TS5RHvq56ByTxHGi]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TS5RHvq56ByTxHGi]]-foot Emanation originating from and including the target. Failure: [[/damage average activity=TS5RHvq56ByTxHGi]] damage.

Earth Glide.name: Earth Glide
Earth Glide.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

Earthen Maul.name: Earthen Maul
Earthen Maul.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Eldritch Lantern.name: Eldritch Lantern
Eldritch Lantern.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

Eldritch Restoration.name: Eldritch Restoration
Eldritch Restoration.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in [[/r 5d10]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

Elemental Absorption.name: Elemental Absorption
Elemental Absorption.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=5HvUimjPYvPVM4g7]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gives itself Resistance to that instance of damage and gains [[/healing temp]].

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's damage resistances. You can enable the damage resistance of your choice in the character sheet's effects tab.

heal.condition: takes Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage

Resistance: Acid.name: Resistance: Acid
Resistance: Acid.description: The creature has resistance to acid damage.

Resistance: Cold.name: Resistance: Cold
Resistance: Cold.description: The creature has resistance to cold damage.

Resistance: Fire.name: Resistance: Fire
Resistance: Fire.description: The creature has resistance to fire damage.

Resistance: Lightning.name: Resistance: Lightning
Resistance: Lightning.description: The creature has resistance to lightning damage.

Resistance: Thunder.name: Resistance: Thunder
Resistance: Thunder.description: The creature has resistance to thunder damage.

Elemental Burst.name: Elemental Burst
Elemental Burst.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

Elemental Claw.name: Elemental Claw
Elemental Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice). If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

attack.chatFlavor: On Hit: The target moves 10 ft away.

Elemental Restoration.name: Elemental Restoration
Elemental Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]], its body dissolves into dirt, and it gains a new body in [[/r 1d4#Days]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Earth.

Enchanting Bow.name: Enchanting Bow
Enchanting Bow.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Energy Drain.name: Energy Drain
Energy Drain.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3jwFie9se3ZA1RvG]] feet. Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by 14 ([[/r 4d6]]). Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed and can move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures and objects.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], each creature or object whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters for the first time during this move.

Failure: The target is engulfed. While engulfed, a target has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the engulfed target moves with it. A nonmagical object is destroyed after spending 1 minute engulfed.

While engulfed, a creature takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. An engulfed creature that is reduced to 0 Hit Points dissolves into ash, which is ejected into the Astral Sea.

Success: The target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.name: Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained
Total Cover, Suffocating & Restrained.description: At the start of each of its turns, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, has the &Reference[Restrained apply=long] condition, and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

Entangling Plants.name: Entangling Plants
Entangling Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]).

Entangling Rope.name: Entangling Rope
Entangling Rope.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the rope is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses a Bonus Action to release the target, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Entangling Rope again.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the rope is destroyed.

Entangling Trail.name: Entangling Trail
Entangling Trail.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it moves is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Enthralling Panache.name: Enthralling Panache
Enthralling Panache.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Ephemeral.name: Ephemeral
Ephemeral.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t wear or carry anything.

Eruption.name: Eruption
Eruption.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Elemental Burst attack.

Ethereal Jaunt.name: Ethereal Jaunt
Ethereal Jaunt.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa.

Ethereal Sight.name: Ethereal Sight
Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

Ethereal Stride.name: Ethereal Stride
Ethereal Stride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

Etherealness.name: Etherealness
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEtherealne]{Etherealness} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but it can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Euphoria Breath.name: Euphoria Breath
Euphoria Breath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], it succeeds automatically. While Incapacitated, the target uses all its movement on each of its turns to move in a random direction.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Evasion.name: Evasion
Evasion.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

Exalted Restoration.name: Exalted Restoration
Exalted Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

Extract Brain.name: Extract Brain
Extract Brain.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tentacles. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] damage. Failure or Success: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and devours its brain.

Eye Rays.name: Eye Rays
Eye Rays.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d10]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Charm Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] or until it takes damage. Success: Half damage only.

2: Paralyzing Ray. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]]. Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: Half damage only.
