Grasping Root.name: Grasping Root
Grasping Root.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]] [[lookup @range.units activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]]. Failure: The target is pulled up to [[lookup @target.template.size activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=t4WdQWTV3tN4xcdO]]. straight toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 目标并被其六条树根之一缠绕陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态，（逃脱DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]。

Grave-Dust Flight.name: 坟土飞扬
Grave-Dust Flight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to its Fly Speed, shedding grave dust. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=jjHZ0sa9Ihw0qnC5]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jjHZ0sa9Ihw0qnC5]]-feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it moves is targeted once by the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jjHZ0sa9Ihw0qnC5]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态，直到半巫妖的下一回合结束。

Great Bow.name: 巨弓
Great Bow.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标的速度降低 10 尺直至其下个一回合结束。

Speed: -10 Ft..name: 速度降低 10 尺
Speed: -10 Ft..description: 你的速度降低 10 尺直至下一回合结束。

Greater Magic Resistance.name: 强化魔法抗性
Greater Magic Resistance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and the attack rolls of spells automatically miss it. Without the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s permission, no spell can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts, creature type, or alignment.

Guiding Light.name: 明光道标
Guiding Light.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用施法施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol]（2 环版本）。

Hag’s Swipe.name: 鬼婆猛打
Hag’s Swipe.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次幽魂利爪攻击。

Hail of Stone.name: 土石洪流
Hail of Stone.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]]-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=wVQbYLwPnJlczoss]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Hammer Throw.name: 投掷炎锤
Hammer Throw.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，目标被 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 直线推离至多 15 尺。目标下一回合结束前进行的下次攻击检定具有劣势。

attack.chatFlavor: 命中：目标被直线推离至多 15 尺。

Disadv.: Attacks.name: 劣势：攻击
Disadv.: Attacks.description: 你的下一回合结束前进行的下一次攻击检定具有劣势。

Harpoon.name: 鱼叉
Harpoon.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 将目标直线拉近至多15尺。

attack.chatFlavor: 命中：将目标直线拉近至多 15 尺。

Hasten.name: 加速
Hasten.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 执行 &Reference[Dash] 和 &Reference[Disengage] 动作。

Haunted Zone.name: 缠魂之地
Haunted Zone.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xmF8v1o2HyVyepb6]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xmF8v1o2HyVyepb6]] [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xmF8v1o2HyVyepb6]] while inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space. Failure: The spell fails and is wasted.

Haunting Glare.name: 缠魂怒视
Haunting Glare.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kIxd4BuhFya6117b]]，源自 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=kIxd4BuhFya6117b]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，并在其回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。[[lookup @duration.value activity=kIxd4BuhFya6117b]] 分钟后，其豁免自动成功。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，并在你回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止你身上的该效应。1 分钟后，你的豁免自动成功。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Heart Sight.name: 真心视界
Heart Sight.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see (Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the target’s emotions and alignment.

Heat Aura.name: 炽热灵光
Heat Aura.description: 在每个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 回合结束时，位于源自 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]] 尺光环区域内的所有生物均受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Hellfire Orb.name: 地狱火珠
Hellfire Orb.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=q3tW0wl3eLe2rDU9]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Hellfire Spellcasting.name: 狱火施法
Hellfire Spellcasting.description: The pit fiend casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).. It can replace one Fireball with @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster} (level 7 version) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}.

Hellish Rebuke.name: 炼狱叱喝
Hellish Rebuke.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHellishReb]（触发条件见该法术），使用其施法动作的施法属性。

Hellish Restoration.name: Hellish Restoration
Hellish Restoration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

Hold Breath.name: 屏息
Hold Breath.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for {N} {Units}.

Holy Burst.name: 圣光暴
Holy Burst.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

Holy Word.name: 至圣真言
Holy Word.description: 感知豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=hDo31s3Eg9EW7GUZ]]，源自[[lookup @name lowercase]]的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=hDo31s3Eg9EW7GUZ]]尺光环区域内的所有敌人。 失败： [[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Stunned apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowercase]]的下个回合结束。 成功：仅半伤。

Stunned.name: 震慑
Stunned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Stunned apply=false] 状态直至大祭司的下一回合结束。

Hook.name: 钩爪
Hook.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target 5 feet straight toward or away from itself.

attack.chatFlavor: 命中：目标向靠近或远离自己的方向直线移动 5 尺

Horrific Necrosis.name: 骇怖坏灭
Horrific Necrosis.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到其下一回合结束。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直到下一回合结束。

Horrific Visage.name: 恐惧面容
Horrific Visage.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]]-foot Cone that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and isn’t an Undead. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到报丧妖的下一回合开始。

Horrify.name: 恐惧
Horrify.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] [[lookup @range.units activity=HLddTFpf4viIdEOL]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到报丧妖的下一回合开始。

Horror Nimbus.name: 恐惧灵气
Horror Nimbus.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of line of sight.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the attacking creature out of line of sight.

Howl.name: Howl
Howl.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GzcwPXLq5lrc8kSK]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Failure or Success: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到报丧妖的下一回合开始。

Hunger of Hadar.name: Hunger of Hadar
Hunger of Hadar.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHungerofHa]{Hunger of Hadar} (level 5 version), requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

Hunger of Yeenoghu.name: Hunger of Yeenoghu
Hunger of Yeenoghu.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] of magical Darkness originating from a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @range.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]]., which lasts for [[lookup @duration.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s &Reference[Concentration] ends on it. This area is &Reference[DifficultTerrain].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sIJYYjLHqCAPxOLm]] that starts its turn in this area or enters it for the first time on a turn.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or a creature of its choice it can see gains [[/healing activity=DXSz02tEbmOq9fOu]] Hit Points.

Success: Half damage.

Hurl Flame.name: Hurl Flame
Hurl Flame.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn’t being worn or carried, it starts burning.

Hypnotic Gaze.name: Hypnotic Gaze
Hypnotic Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Sc5RbdImboeEd4zt]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Ice Spear.name: Ice Spear
Ice Spear.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Speed -10.name: Speed -10
Speed -10.description: Until the end of its next turn, the target's speed decreases by 10 feet.

Ice Walk.name: Ice Walk
Ice Walk.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

Ice Wall.name: Ice Wall
Ice Wall.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

Icy Bite.name: Icy Bite
Icy Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Speed: -5 ft..name: Speed: -5 ft.
Speed: -5 ft..description: The target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the attacking creature's next turn.

Ignited Illumination.name: Ignited Illumination
Ignited Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

Illumination.name: Illumination
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a {m}-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional {n} feet.

Illusory Appearance.name: Illusory Appearance
Illusory Appearance.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]). The spell’s duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

Incite Rampage.name: Incite Rampage
Incite Rampage.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets another [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]]. The target can take a &Reference[Reaction] to make one melee attack.

Incorporeal Movement.name: Incorporeal Movement
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Incubus Form.name: Incubus Form
Incubus Form.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

Infernal Glaive.name: Infernal Glaive
Infernal Glaive.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn’t already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]]. Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

Infernal Sting.name: Infernal Sting
Infernal Sting.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Infernal Tail.name: Infernal Tail
Infernal Tail.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn’t have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

Inferno Blast.name: Inferno Blast
Inferno Blast.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] damage, and the target starts burning, taking [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]] damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that effect can be applied multiple times, the effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target item's sheet each time the target gains a level of exhaustion after the initial level is applied.

Exhaustion.name: Exhaustion
Exhaustion.description: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Injecting Claw.name: Injecting Claw
Injecting Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]]. Failure: The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg.

Over [[/r 2d4*10#Days egg gestates]]{2d4 × 10} days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{Slaad Tadpole}, which chews out of the host and kills it.

Ink Cloud.name: Ink Cloud
Ink Cloud.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

Blinded: Heavily Obscured.name: Blinded: Heavily Obscured
Blinded: Heavily Obscured.description: You have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition while trying to see something in a Heavily Obscured space.

Inscrutable.name: Inscrutable
Inscrutable.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

Invisible in Water.name: Invisible in Water

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

Loathsome Limbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
Loathsome Limbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l’s limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

Exhaustion 1.name: Exhaustion 1
Exhaustion 1.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Exhaustion 2.name: Exhaustion 2
Exhaustion 2.description: The creature has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb.

Lordly Presence.name: Lordly Presence
Lordly Presence.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]] that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects:

Captivated (Forager Only). The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Fearful (Hunter Only). The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Mired (Sage Only). The target takes [[/damage average activity=hYhryWdKIuHOzmO3]] damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Bewildered.name: Bewildered
Bewildered.description: The target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

Lunge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Dread Blade attack.

Luring Song.name: Luring Song
Luring Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Luring Song for 24 hours.

Charmed & Incapacitated.name: Charmed & Incapacitated
Charmed & Incapacitated.description:
The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

Bewildered.name: Bewildered
Bewildered.description: The target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

Misty Escape.name: 雾遁
Misty Escape.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can’t use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can’t return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target’s skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can’t regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

Damage: Outside Water.name: Damage: Outside Water
Damage: Outside Water.chatFlavor: Damage: Every 10 min. unless skin is wet.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage 1d12 Acid average]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

Mud Breath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=i727Jd3IBfZezMPy]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Multiple Heads.name: Multiple Heads
Multiple Heads.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

Mutating Claw.name: Mutating Claw
Mutating Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]]. Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description:
On failing a Constitution save, the target is cursed.

The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

Necrosis.name: Necrosis
Necrosis.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Necrotic Burst attack.

Necrotic Breath.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=3LncbUYMp4rOrQ3U]]-foot Cone. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]. [[lookup @target.affects.type capitalize activity=TLqcxF6OYH0LweRo]]s in that area can’t regain Hit Points until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. An intact Humanoid corpse there instantly rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmZombie00000000]{Zombie} under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control and takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same initiative count.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet. Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for 1 hour, until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Nightmare Haunting.name: Nightmare Haunting
Nightmare Haunting.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell’s messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s soul bag, and the target can’t be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

Nightmare Ray.name: Nightmare Ray
Nightmare Ray.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Nimble Escape.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] feet.

Onslaught.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Claw or Tail attack.

Ooze Cube.name: Ooze Cube
Ooze Cube.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

Total Cover.name: Total Cover

Otherworldly Strike.name: Otherworldly Strike

After [[lookup @duration.value activity=6c9CieCQWV7XsKLy]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

After [[lookup @duration.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], it succeeds automatically.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]]-foot Cone.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]. The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

Pincer.name: Pincer
Pincer.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two pincers.

Grappled.name: Grappled
Grappled.description: If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Pincer Staff.name: Pincer Staff
Pincer Staff.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Pincer Staff attacks.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 12， [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。且寇涛驱策者无法再次发动钳杖攻击，直至擒抱结束。

Poison.name: 毒药

Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至攻击者的下一回合开始。

Poison Breath.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功： 半伤。

Poison Spray.name: 毒气喷溅
Poison Spray.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=Ab1fnEh4JGShDFte]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

失败：[[/damage average]] 伤害，且目标陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 的下个回合结束。中毒期间，目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

成功：仅半伤。

Poisoned & Blinded.name: 中毒并目盲
Poisoned & Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至憎恶蛇人的下个回合结束。中毒期间，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态。

Poisonous Spittle.name: 剧毒蛇涎
Poisonous Spittle.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] feet. Failure: 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 状态直至守秘纳迦的下一回合开始。

Portent.name: 预兆
Portent.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=uGaJoaDIgntkFbDg]] it can see makes a D20 Test. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] rolls [[/r 1d20]] and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

Possession.name: 附身
Possession.description:
魅力豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 可见的类人生物。

失败：目标被[[lookup @name lowcase]] 附身。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 消失，目标陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态并失去对身体的控制。现在由 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 控制身体，但是目标仍然保留自我意识。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 不能成为任意攻击、法术或其他效应的目标，针对不死生物的效应除外。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 仍然保留自己的游戏数据，但是使用附身目标的速度，以及力量、敏捷与体质调整值。附身持续至身体的生命值降至0，或在 [[lookup @name lowcase]] 以附赠动作解除附身时结束。附身结束时，[[lookup @name lowcase]] 会出现在目标 5 尺内一处未占据空间，且目标在 24 小时内免疫此[[lookup @name lowcase]] 的附身。

成功：目标在接下来 24 小时内免疫[[lookup @name lowcase]] 的附身。

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态并失去对身体的控制。

Pounce.name: 扑杀
Pounce.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度一半的距离并发动一次 [[/item .mmRend0000000000]] 攻击。

Prance.name: 欢腾羊跃
Prance.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]，且目标陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至[[lookup @name lowercase]]的下一回合开始。

Charmed.name: 魅惑

Probing Telepathy.description: 若一名 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生物与其进行心灵感应，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 将了解这个生物最强烈的渴望。

Proboscis.name: 刺喙
Proboscis.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标为生物，其生命值上限减少等于其受到暗蚀伤害的数值。

Prone Deficiency.name: 倒地缺陷
Prone Deficiency.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 陷入倒地状态，掷一枚骰子。若结果为奇数，其陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 在其每个回合结束时进行一次 [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LfYXT04YlFJUhscb]] 的敏捷豁免，豁免成功则结束失能状态。

Incapacitated.name: 失能
Incapacitated.description: 若结果为奇数，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态。

Protection.name: 守护
Protection.description:
Trigger: An attack roll hits the wearer of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Protected.description: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the bestower's next turn.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

+3 AC.name: +3 AC
+3 AC.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Roar.name: Roar
Roar.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

First Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], each enemy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]].

Second Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] damage only.

[[/damage average extended]], and a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]] [[lookup @range.units activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]]. of the target ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) takes [[/damage average activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]] damage.

Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Shielded Mind.name: Shielded Mind
Shielded Mind.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s thoughts can’t be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

Shield of Faith.name: Shield of Faith
Shield of Faith.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]{Shield of Faith}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Shimmering Shield.name: Shimmering Shield
Shimmering Shield.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Shielded.name: Shielded
Shielded.description: The target's AC increases by 2 until the end of the bestower's next turn.

Shockwave of Glory.name: Shockwave of Glory
Shockwave of Glory.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Shriek.name: Shriek
Shriek.description: Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] or a source of Bright Light moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a shriek audible within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of itself for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

Sickening Ray.name: Sickening Ray
Sickening Ray.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness} (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Sickening Vapors.name: Sickening Vapors
Sickening Vapors.description: Sickening Vapors. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Siege Monster.name: Siege Monster
Siege Monster.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

Silver Sword.name: Silver Sword
Silver Sword.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAstralProj]{Astral Projection} spell), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

Slaying Bow.name: Slaying Bow
Slaying Bow.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]]. Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000] spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]).

Sleep Breath.name: Sleep Breath
Sleep Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Incapacitated.name: Incapacitated
Incapacitated.description: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for the duration (see source item for the length of the duration).

Sleep Gaze.name: Sleep Gaze
Sleep Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @labels.duration activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

Unconscious.name: Unconscious
Unconscious.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for the duration (see source item for the length of the duration) or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

Slowing Breath.name: Slowing Breath
Slowing Breath.description:
体质豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]] 尺锥状区域内的每名生物。

失败：直至目标的下个回合结束，目标速度减半，无法执行反应，且目标在其回合中仅可以执行一个动作或一个附赠动作，但不能同时执行二者。

1/2 Speed | Action Restrictions.name: 1/2 Speed | Action Restrictions
1/2 Speed | Action Restrictions.description: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

Smelting Charge.name: Smelting Charge
Smelting Charge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and [[lookup @range.special activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]

Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters a creature’s space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]); if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a creature Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Prone & Restrained.name: Prone & Restrained
Prone & Restrained.description:
If the target is already Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Radiant Ray attack.

Smoke Bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a bomb to a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] feet of itself.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the attacking creature’s next turn.

Smother.name: Smother
Smother.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

Grappled + Other Conditions.name: Grappled + Other Conditions
Grappled + Other Conditions.description:
The target is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC) instead of dealing damage.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}

Sonic Boom.name: Sonic Boom
Sonic Boom.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Soul Bag.name: Soul Bag
Soul Bag.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

Soul Gem.name: Soul Gem
Soul Gem.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magical gem. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed while the gem is on the same plane of existence as it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in [[/r 1d20]] days, regaining all its Hit Points and appearing within 5 feet of the gem.

The gem is a Tiny object that has AC 20; HP 50; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The gem regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the gem is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new one by completing an 8-hour ritual using a gem worth 1,000+ GP and by expending 5,000 GP, which the ritual consumes.

Soul Tome.name: Soul Tome
Soul Tome.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic tome. While holding or carrying the tome, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Banishing Claw action.

The tome has AC 17; HP 35; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The tome regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points or when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the tome is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new one when it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Speak with Beasts and Plants.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
Speak with Beasts and Plants.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

Speak with Frogs and Toads.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
Speak with Frogs and Toads.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

mmSpectralClaw00.name: 幽魂利爪
mmSpectralClaw00.description: 近战或远程攻击检定： [[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]] 尺。命中： [[/damage average]] 伤害。如果目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Spectral Jaws.name: Spectral Jaws
Spectral Jaws.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spell Immunity.name: Spell Immunity
Spell Immunity.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

Spell Reflection.name: Spell Reflection
Spell Reflection.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]]

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Save.name: Save
Save.condition: succeeds on a saving throw against a spell, or a spell’s attack roll misses it.

Spell Storing.name: Spell Storing
Spell Storing.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster’s spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

Spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no {type} components and using {ability} as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spelldc]]):

At Will: {spell}

{count}/Day Each: {spell}

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Spirit Jar.name: Spirit Jar
Spirit Jar.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s lair.

Spirit Wail.name: Spirit Wail
Spirit Wail.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Frightened.name: Frightened
Frightened.description: The creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Spiritual Weapon.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Spiteful Escape.name: Spiteful Escape
Spiteful Escape.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points, it dies only if it is within 30 feet of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s most hated thing). Otherwise, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can’t return to the plane it left for [[/r 2d6]] days. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports away, each creature within 60 feet of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

Cursed: Disadv. Checks & Saves.name: Cursed: Disadv. Checks & Saves
Cursed: Disadv. Checks & Saves.description: Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws.

Split.name: Split
Split.description: Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]] Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

Split.name: Split
Split.condition: is Large or Medium and has 10+ Hit Points, it becomes Bloodied or is subjected to Lightning or Slashing damage.

Spore Bomb.name: Spore Bomb
Spore Bomb.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] feet].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Success: Half damage only.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the violet fungus necrohulk next turn.

Spores.name: Spores
Spores.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Stake to the Heart.name: Stake to the Heart
Stake to the Heart.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
Paralyzed.description: The staked creature has the Incapacitated condition in its resting place, the staked creature has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the weapon is removed.

Standing Leap.name: Standing Leap
Standing Leap.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

Steal Body.name: Steal Body
Steal Body.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]]

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull.

While there, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target’s game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must leave it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

By spending 5 feet of its movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies unless its brain is restored before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Total Cover.name: Total Cover
Total Cover.description: The possessesing creature has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host.

Languages.name: Languages
Languages.description: The possessing creature retains its understanding of Deep Speech and its telepathy.

Steam Breath.name: Steam Breath
Steam Breath.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

Stench.name: Stench
Stench.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Stench Spray.name: Stench Spray
Stench Spray.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]] the [[lookup @name]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=MD1NjuNJfDjxKGrL]] feet. Failure: The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid, exudes a stench for [[/r 1d4]] hours, and has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures have the Poisoned condition while in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the coated target. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short or Long Rest.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The target is coated in a foul-smelling liquid for [[/r 1d4]] hours and has the &Reference[Poisoned] condition while the stench lasts. Other creatures within a 5-foot emanation of the coated target also have the Poisoned condition. The target can remove the stench on itself if it bathes during a Short or Long Rest.

Sticky Net.name: Sticky Net
Sticky Net.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.formula activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] the kuo-toa can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=MxEs7KnCVGemObHx]] feet.
