Umbral Strike.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度一半的距离，并发动一次葬送打击或灾疫射线攻击。

Uncanny Dodge.name: 直觉闪避
Uncanny Dodge.description: 触发：[[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=NzfYZzkrG4qJ13to]]。响应：[[lookup @name lowercase]] 因此次攻击受到的伤害减半（向下取整）。

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: 当 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 因非光耀非重击伤害导致生命值降为 0 时，其进行一次体质豁免检定（DC 为 5 + 所受伤害）。豁免成功则改为将生命值降至 1。

Undead Restoration.name: 亡灵复苏
Undead Restoration.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在赎罪前被消灭，其在 [[/r 1d10]] 天后获得一副新的躯体，以满生命值复活。新躯体会出现在对 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 来说意义重大的位置。

Unicorn's Blessing.name: 独角兽祝福
Unicorn's Blessing.description: [[lookup @name]] 使用其角触碰另一生物，并对该生物施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{疗伤术} 或 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{次等复原术}，使用与施法动作相同的施法属性。

Unnerving Gaze.name: 可怖凝视
Unnerving Gaze.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: A creature the devil can see

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直至其回合结束。

Unsettling Visage.name: 诡异面容
Unsettling Visage.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], it succeeds automatically.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，并在每一回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止自身上的此效应。1 分钟后，豁免自动成功。

Vampire Weakness.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weakness.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Disadv. Attacks & Checks.name: Disadv. Attacks & Checks
Disadv. Attacks & Checks.description: 若其身处阳光下，其进行的属性检定和攻击检定具有劣势。

Vampiric Connection.name: 血裔连结
Vampiric Connection.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s senses.

Vanish.name: 消失
Vanish.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 你及你的光照获得 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态直至专注终止，该效应会在发动攻击或使用附赠动作后立即结束。

Veil of Shadow.name: Veil of Shadow
Veil of Shadow.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shadow Stealth, and [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ODogaJU4TRqxPSNo]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Vengeful Glare.name: 复仇怒视
Vengeful Glare.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=r2U9soI3vKTrXhG1]], it succeeds automatically. If the Frightened target is cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (see [[/item .LuIttybjU4f7tGCs]]), the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration.

Frightened & Paralyzed.name: Frightened & Paralyzed
Frightened & Paralyzed.description: If the attacking creature curses the Frightened target, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition for the duration. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Vile Appearance.name: 丑恶容貌
Vile Appearance.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]], any [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s true form.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Horrific Appearance for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至下一回合开始。

Vortex.name: 涡流
Vortex.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space. Failure: [[/damage average activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target can’t cast spells with a Verbal component and takes [[/damage average activity=kDz92inkRCjGrPiz]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turns.

Grappled.name: 受擒
Grappled.description:
The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]], see source item for DC).

Until the grapple ends, the target can’t cast spells with a Verbal component and takes additional damage at the start of each of the NPC’s turns.

Vow of Revenge.name: 死仇誓言
Vow of Revenge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=NBJRR41fIGp8FYJh]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance to and direction of the cursed target, even if it is on a different plane of existence. The curse ends on the target if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses this Bonus Action on a different creature.

War Cry.name: 战吼
War Cry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uN0VTW2Fqig7YAs9]] of its choice that can see or hear it gains [[/healing average temp]] and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Attack: Advantage.name: 攻击：优势
Attack: Advantage.description: 你进行攻击检定时具有优势，直至施加者的下一回合开始。

Warding Charm.name: 魅力之佑
Warding Charm.description:
Trigger: A creature hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTaurVqDcUSvviyB]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack roll misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.condition: 一名生物对攻击生物进行攻击检定并命中。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 如果你的攻击检定未命中目标，则你陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态，直至施加者的下一回合结束。

Warp Step.name: 扭曲步
Warp Step.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports, along with [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] of its choice within [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] of it, up to [[lookup @range.value activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]] feet [[lookup @range.special activity=xKCUfhoRUHj6f8TE]].

Warping Hex.name: 扭曲恶咒
Warping Hex.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KaTc2c6hOHAqtywC]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the target.  Since the Exhaustion condition can be applied multiple times, the Active Effect must be dragged from this item’s Effects tab onto the target item’s sheet after the initial application of the Exhaustion condition.

Water Bound.name: Water Bound
Water Bound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

Water Breathing.name: Water Breathing
Water Breathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for {duration} outside water.

Water Form.name: Water Form
Water Form.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

Water Jet.name: Water Jet
Water Jet.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=CY2HqHThU06Jf0Bw]]-foot-wide Line. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Prone.name: Prone
Prone.description: If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the attacking creature and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Water Susceptibility.name: Water Susceptibility
Water Susceptibility.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage damage for every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured to roll the correct number of dice based on the distance traveled through water. 1 is default for 5 feet, 2 is for 10 feet, and so forth.

Watery Rebuke.name: Watery Rebuke
Watery Rebuke.description: Trigger: An enemy the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response—Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nCfH0YgOhJR2wIKd]], the triggering enemy. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by conjured water.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.chatFlavor: On Failure: Target pushed 30 ft. away from creature.

Watery Rush.name: Watery Rush
Watery Rush.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=xoYfePV5epjJkYHX]] without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

Expend Use.name: Expend Use
Expend Use.condition: moves up to half its Swim Speed

Weakening Breath.name: Weakening Breath
Weakening Breath.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]], each creature that isn’t currently affected by this breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

Weakened.name: Weakened
Weakened.description: 目标进行基于力量的D20检定时具有劣势，且其伤害掷骰承受2（1d4）减值。目标在其回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的该效应。1分钟后，其豁免自动成功。

Web.name: Web
Web.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply] condition until the web is destroyed.

Web Strand.name: Web Strand
Web Strand.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]], one Large or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

Restrained.name: Restrained
Restrained.description: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed.

Web Walker.name: Web Walker
Web Walker.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Weight of Years.name: 岁月之重
Weight of Years.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet. Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Weird Insight.name: 怪异洞悉
Weird Insight.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=o6eFmn0HWGbQjzdG]] feet. Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically learns one fact or secret about the target.

Whelm.name: 淹没
Whelm.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

Grappled & Restrained.name: Grappled & Restrained
Grappled & Restrained.description: 若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态 （逃脱DC见来源条目）. 直至擒抱结束，目标陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态,，目标 &Reference[Suffocating]{窒息} 除非其能在水中呼吸，且目标在每个攻击生物的回合开始时受到伤害（伤害值见来源条目）。

Whirlwind.name: 旋风
Whirlwind.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]], each Medium or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.chatFlavor: On Failure: Target is pushed 20 feet back.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 目标被攻击生物直线推离至多 20 尺，并陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Whirlwind of Sand.name: Whirlwind of Sand
Whirlwind of Sand.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. Each creature of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Expend Use.name: 耗用
Expend Use.condition: 攻击生物被一次攻击检定命中。

+2 AC.name: +2 AC
+2 AC.description: 攻击生物令其对抗那次攻击的AC+2，可能令那次攻击改为失手。

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: Each creature of the attacking creature's choice that it can see within 5 ft. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=long] condition until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

Wind Javelin.name: 风之标枪
Wind Javelin.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Hit or Miss: The javelin magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Wind Staff.name: 风之法杖
Wind Staff.description: 近战或远程攻击检定： [[/attack]]，触及 [[lookup @item.range.reach]] 尺或射程 [[lookup @item.range.value]] 尺。命中： [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Wishes.name: 祈愿
Wishes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can understand. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the spell for the creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suffers none of the spell’s stress. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has cast it three times, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t do so again for 365 days.

Witch Strike.name: 巫术雷击
Witch Strike.description: Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]] cursed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and within [[lookup @range.value activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]] [[lookup @range.units activity=H15XAJ5lhXfk1d4v]]. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

World-Shaking Movement.name: 撼世神行
World-Shaking Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 移动至多等于其速度的距离。在此次移动结束时，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 制造一道骤然爆发的震波，覆盖一个以其为中心、半径为 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]] 的范围。位于该区域内的生物失去 &Reference[Concentration]，且若其不超过中型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 直至其下个回合开始前无法再次使用此动作。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 位于该区域内的生物失去 &Reference[Concentration]，且若其不超过中型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。
